title: Lucian has the lowest winrate among ADC's

replies.body: Don't really care for now. We have seen enough of him since his release date. Something should probably be done about Vayne next though.
q bonus ratio lowered and r invis halved thank fuck

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=VJyntLJi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-30T19:59:16.076+0000)
>
> Don't really care for now. We have seen enough of him since his release date. Something should probably be done about Vayne next though.

Yeah she has nerfs on the PBE right now, I believe to R invisibility and Q bonus damage.

News to me! he still deletes me in a second or two no matter who i am.

Hopefully he stays at the bottom of the pile for years to come!
_(hopefully to soon be joined by vayne and the rest of the cancer.)_
He is quite weak right now actually, so not surprised.
Does he? That's unfortunate, I always viewed him as one of the funnest ADCs to play despite his relative weakness.
